name: Anima (itch) (samirawad)
description:
Animas 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Anima meaning the soul, especially the irrational part of the soul as distinguished from the rational mind

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Animas is a first-person single-player maze where two characters are controlled by one player. The player must navigate both mazes at the same time by switching bodies to touch hearts (rational) in one maze that unlocks the doors (irrational) in the other maze! This symbolizes how a relationship could navigate a shared problem. The objective of this game is to get to the center and collect all the hearts placed throughout the maze and get to the center building containing the biggest heart of them all, mending the relationship.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:  

WASD - Movement

E - Interact

Tab - Switch players

Q -Menu

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Developers: Samira Awad, Ash Elliott, Hannah Pham & Tina Nguyen

Software: Unreal Engine, Blender & Maya

Lousiana State University
